about_the_game:
The "Naughty Ice Formations" DLC introduces a hilarious new incentive for successfully "blowing" your opponent! When you land an blow attack on your opponent now, you have about a 20% chance of stunning them for a full additional second, which humiliates them so badly that they form brand new ice formations!

Naughty ice formations can occur on the games first four characters: Andy, Dante, Angela, and Deborah Fire.

content_descriptors.notes: The Naughty Ice Formations DLC contains suggestive adult images of human nudity in ice formations.  Intended for adult humor and maturity levels.

Naughty ice formations can occur on the games first four characters: Andy, Dante, Angela, and Deborah Fire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
